sentence.Network_en: About one - seventh of all farmland is owned by corporations, about two - thirds of which are family corporations.
sentence.Network_cn: 有七分之一的农田为公司所有, 这些公司中有 三分之二 是家庭公司.

sentence.Network_en: One - seventh of your life is spent on Mondays.
sentence.Network_cn: (最讨厌星期一么?)可你一生七分之一的时候都在过星期一.

sentence.Network_en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

he fills out his medication orders online and sends them from his ward on the seventh floor to the in-house pharmacy in the basement , where a robot puts the prescribed drugs in an envelope for the nurses to dispense .然后，他在线开出药方，通过网络从七楼的病区传送到地下室的内部药房。
